Help: On the step "Field assignment" you indicate more article-description to your source code. The following fields are category-dependent article-descriptions with their assigned categories.
The individual article-descriptions will be grouped after their basic index. You can view the individual article indexes, if you click the basic index in their blue highlighted boxes.
